thread.title: Anwar's beau Nicola Peltz gets the Hadid family approval | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Anwar's beau Nicola Peltz gets the Hadid family approval | Daily Mail Online

author: Mailonline Reporter
title: Anwar's beau Nicola Peltz gets the Hadid family approval | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 238 shares It comes after Anwar and Nicola put on a very loved up display as they watched Gigi and his other sister Bella on the catwalk this week. The new couple attended Tommy Hilfiger's Spring 2017 show in Los Angeles on Wednesday - even sharing a sweet kiss on the carpet. PDA session: Anwar Hadid leaned in to kiss his girlfriend Nicola Peltz while on the carpet for Tommy Hilfiger's Spring 2017 Women's Collection on Wednesday in Los Angeles Perfect match: Anwar, 17, supported his sisters Gigi and Bella Hadid with none other than his new 22-year-old girlfriend on his arm Young love: Anwar, 17, sweetly held her face before leaning in to plant a smooch on her lips Anwar sweetly held her face before leaning in to plant a smooch on her lips. For the fashion show, Nicola rocked a cropped sweatshirt that flashed her svelte physique along with a black leather mini skirt and high heels. Styling her bright blonde hair in loose waves with a side part, the actress looked glam with a peachy touch of blush and long lashes. Anwar, meanwhile, rocked a long grey coat, beige trousers, a graphic print top, and glossy shoes. Gazing affectionately at his gorgeous girlfriend, it was clear Anwar only had eyes for Nicola. The actress - who previously dated Justin Bieber - opened up last month about her new romance with Anwar. 'We're hanging out. Honestly, he is an angel,' she told website Women's Wear Daily . 'He's such an amazing person.' The Transformers: Age Of Extinction star also seems to be in with his family, raving about the model's famous older sisters, Gigi, 21, and Bella Hadid, 20. The look of love: Gazing affectionately at his gorgeous girlfriend, it was clear Anwar only had eyes for Nicola Family affair! Peltz was joined by her brother, Will Peltz 'He comes from such an amazing family,' she added. 'Gigi and Bella are so, so sweet. I just love his family so much. Theyâ€™re feminine, strong girls. To have that around is amazing.' But insiders insist it's still early days for the cute couple. 'They are dating. It's a fairly new relationship,' an insider told E! News . 'But they are really good friends and part of the same group of friends.' The pair share a best friend in Sofia Richie, 18 - 35-year-old Nicole Richie's younger sister - and are both regularly seen hanging out with her. She's his rose! Hadid shared a sweet snap last month of himself wrapping his arms around Nicola as he carried a bouquet of white roses Show of support! Anwar's sisters, Gigi and Bella Hadid, were starring in the Tommy Hilfiger show
